name.en: Seminar in Ming Dynasty Philosophy II

goal.ch: 明代儒學在儒學史上的地位很高，如王陽明及其弟子、劉蕺山與蕺山學派，把儒家哲學義理發展到空前的高度，在當代的有關研究也成果不斷。本課程通過當代儒學對明代理學的詮釋，希望能比較有深度的展示明儒重要派別的主要思想，根據有代表性的明儒的文獻，給出當代的詮釋。
goal.en:
Confucianism in Ming Dynasty has a high position in the history of Confucianism, such as Wang Yangming and his disciples, Liu Jishan and Jishan School, which developed the Confucian philosophy to an unprecedented height and made continuous achievements in contemporary related research.
Through the interpretation of Neo-Confucianism in Ming Dynasty by contemporary Confucianism, this course hopes to show the main ideas of important schools of Ming Confucianism in depth, and give a contemporary interpretation according to the representative texts of Ming Confucianism.

outline.ch: 本課程擬對明代理學的當代詮釋給出系統的敘述，也根據我最近的研究心得，對程朱、陸王二系是否可以會通，給出新的詮釋。對於此二系的會通，會引入康德的道德哲學的主要見解作為比較的基礎。對於其他重要的明代理學家的思想，如陳白沙、王龍溪、羅近溪、劉蕺山等，會選取《傳習錄》與他們的文集中的重要文獻作深入的探討。
outline.en: This course intends to give a systematic description of the contemporary interpretation of Neo-Confucianism in the Ming Dynasty, and also give a new interpretation of whether Cheng Zhu and Lu Wang can be connected according to my recent research experience. For the communication of these two schools, the main opinions of Kant‘s moral philosophy will be introduced as the basis for comparison. For the thoughts of other important Neo-Confucianists in Ming Dynasty, such as Chen Baisha, Wang Longxi, Jinxi Luo, Liu Jishan, etc., we will choose the “Chuanxi lu” and the important documents in their collections for in-depth discussion.
